document.discussion_title: Multi-Vehicle Accident Shuts Down I-95, Causes Injuries | wltx.com
document.topic_text: Multi-Vehicle Accident Shuts Down I-95 The collision happened near the town of Santee. wltx 11:32 PM. EST August 11, 2016 Rescuers work to get a victim loaded into an ambulance following a crash on Interstate 95 on August 11, 2016. (Photo: WLTX) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST Santee, SC (WLTX) - A multiple vehicle accident on Interstate 95 near Santee shut down the highway for several hours late Thursday night into Friday morning. The collision happened in the northbound lanes near the 95 miles marker, which is between the Old State Road and Highway 15 exits. A witness told News19 the accident involved two cars, a logging truck, and an 18-wheeler. Several people were injured, and the witness saw at least two people get taken by helicopter to the hospital. Logs from the truck had spilled all over the roadway as well. The circumstances leading up to the collision are not yet known.
